channel.title: CVE Feed for Jethin -- Gallery Slideshow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jethin -- Gallery Slideshow

item.title: CVE-2024-37246|2024-08-02T03:50:55.316Z -- jethin -- gallery%20slideshow
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jethin Gallery Slideshow allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gallery Slideshow: from n/a through 1.4.1.
